mapper.sql: ID, USERNAME, TELEPHONE, MAIL, PASSWORD, DEPT_ID, STATUS, REMARK, OPERATOR, OPERATOR_TIME, OPERATOR_IP
mapper.insert: insert into SYS_USER (ID, USERNAME, TELEPHONE, MAIL, PASSWORD, DEPT_ID, STATUS, REMARK, OPERATOR, OPERATOR_TIME, OPERATOR_IP) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{operatorIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into SYS_USER
ID,
USERNAME,
TELEPHONE,
MAIL,
PASSWORD,
DEPT_ID,
STATUS,
REMARK,
OPERATOR,
OPERATOR_TIME,
OPERATOR_IP,

mapper.update:
update SYS_USER
USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TELEPHONE = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAIL = #{mail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPT_ID = #{deptId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPERATOR = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPERATOR_TIME = #{operatorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
OPERATOR_IP = #{operatorIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update SYS_USER set USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TELEPHONE = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAIL = #{mail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPT_ID = #{deptId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATOR = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATOR_TIME = #{operatorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OPERATOR_IP = #{operatorIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select a.id, a.username, a.telephone, a.mail, a.password, a.dept_id, a.status, a.remark, a.operator, a.operator_time, a.operator_ip,b.name from sys_user a,sys_dept b where a.dept_id = b.id

select t.* from ( select rownum rn,a.id, a.username, a.telephone, a.mail, a.password, a.dept_id, a.status, a.remark, a.operator, a.operator_time, a.operator_ip,b.name from sys_user a,sys_dept b where a.dept_id = b.id ) t where rn between #{page.startRow} and #{page.endRow}

select count(1) from SYS_USER where 1=1
and dept_id = #{dept_id}

#{item}
